import { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuthContext } from '../hooks/useAuthContext'; import Announcement from '../Components/Announcement'; import NavBar from '../Components/NavBar'; import Footer from '../Components/Footer'; const moment = require('moment'); export default function Account() { const { user } = useAuthContext(); const [showMessage, setShowMessage] = useState(false); return ( <> {user && ( <>

Profile:{user.userName}

Status Active
User Rating
Member Since {moment(user.createdAt).fromNow()}

Profile Setting

Edited


{showMessage && Save data successfully}
)}
); }
